markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Green Tongue](/Feats.aspx?ID=341) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 138 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Green Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=326)

</column>

---

You share a special kinship with all things green and living. You (and your leshy familiar, if you have one) are constantly under the effects of [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294). Most non-creature plants recognize you as a druid of the [leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2) and are friendly to you.
name: Green Tongue
